page.title: 04John Wilson-Patten (1)
page.content: Winmarleigh's favourite famomous son deserves his place in this study.He was born on 26th April 1802 to Thomas and Elizabeth (nee Hyde). He was educated at{Eton}with contempories the future Lords Derby, Carlisle and Halifax and Spencer Walpole.From Eton he went up to {Magdalene College,Oxford,}following which he spent 3 years on the{Grand {Tour.} Having come into his fathers estates in 1827 he married his cousin Maria, daughter his father's brother Peter Patten-Bold,on the 15th April 1828. On 5th August 1830 to 23rd April 1831 he sat as{Member of Parliament}for Lancashire together with Lord Derby. In 1832 he became Member for North Lancashire,a position he was to hold until 16th March 1874, 42 years in total.
